data.name: TS Marketplace: South Wales Coastal Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
data.detailed_description:
South Wales Scenario Pack includes 10 challenging and enjoyable scenarios for the South Wales Coastal: Bristol - Swansea Route Add-On on Steam, covering passenger operations in this busy commuter route.

Take the driving seat of the Class 143, Class 150, Class 158, Class 175, HST, Class 67 and Class 70 to haul passenger and freight services along the line following real world timetables with real world difficulties from poor weather to broken signals around South Wales.

Included Scenarios


The South Wales Scenario Pack Add-on includes ten operating challenges in career scenario for the South Wales Coastal: Bristol - Swansea Route (Available Separately):

  • 01. 2U06 0737 Weston-super-Mare - Cardiff Central
  • 02. 2B65 1315 Cardiff Central - Swansea
  • 03. 1V38 0930 Manchester Piccadilly - Carmarthen
  • 04. 1F17 1230 Cardiff Central - Portsmouth Harbour
  • 05. 2G68 1715 Maesteg - Cheltenham Spa
  • 06. 2C35 1504 Radyr - Cardiff / 2V35 1515 Cardiff - Radyr
  • 07. 1L90 1729 Swansea - London Paddington part 1
  • 08. 1L90 1729 Swansea - London Paddington part 2
  • 09. FRGT 0902 Margam T.C. - Alexandra Dock Jn. T.C.
  • 10. FRGT 0248 Southampton M.C.T. - Cardiff Wentloog IFT

Please Note: The South Wales Coastal: Bristol - Swansea Route Add-On is required, as a separate purchase, in order to play the scenarios featured in this add-on. Individual scenarios also require the Arriva Trains Wales DMU Pack Add-On, the BR Class 150/1 DMU Add-On and the CrossCountry Class 220 'Voyager' DEMU Add-On.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows® 7 / 8.1
  • Processor:Processor: 2.8 GHz Core 2 Duo (3.2 GHz Core 2 Duo recommended), AMD Athlon MP (multiprocessor variant or comparable processors)
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:512 MB - 1GB with Pixel Shader 3.0 (AGP PCIe only)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:40 GB HD space
  • Sound:Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
  • Graphics:Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required
  • Additional:Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
